00055 /* This is the constructor for the photon map.
00056  * To create the photon map it is necessary to specify the
00057  * maximum number of photons that will be stored
00058 */
00059 
00060 PhotonMap :: PhotonMap( long unsigned maxPhotons )
00061 {
00062     m_storedPhotons = 0;
00063         m_prevScale = 1;
00064         m_maxPhotons = maxPhotons;
00065         m_axis = 0;
00066         m_photons = new Photon*[m_maxPhotons+1];
00067         
00068         if (!m_photons)  tgf::SevereError( "Out of memory initializing photon map" );
00069         
00070         BBox m_bbox();
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 PhotonMap :: ~PhotonMap()
00075 {
00076         Trace trace( "PhotonMap::~PhotonMap", false );
00077         for( long unsigned i = 1; i <= m_storedPhotons; i++) 
00078         {
00079                 delete m_photons[i];
00080         }
00081         delete[] m_photons ;
00082         m_photons = 0;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void PhotonMap::savePhotonMap( const char *filename )
00086 {
00087         FILE *fp=fopen(filename,"wb");
00088         fwrite(m_photons,sizeof(Photon),m_storedPhotons,fp);
00089         fclose(fp);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void PhotonMap::loadPhotonMap( char *filename )
00093 {
00094         FILE *fp;
00095         fp=fopen(filename,"rb");
00096         assert(fp);
00097 struct stat sbuf;
00098         m_storedPhotons = sbuf.st_size/sizeof(Photon);
00099         m_photons = new Photon*[m_maxPhotons+1];
00100         int count = fread(m_photons,sizeof(Photon),m_storedPhotons,fp);
00101         fclose(fp);
00102         if(count != m_storedPhotons)
00103         {
00104                 std::cout << "PhotonMap::loadPhotonMap count != m_storePhotons" << std::endl;   
00105         }
00106         m_halfStoredPhotons = m_storedPhotons/2-1;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void PhotonMap::locatePhotons( NearestPhotons* const np, const long unsigned index ) const
00110 {
00111     Photon* p = m_photons[index];
00112         double dist1;
00113         
00114     if ( index < m_halfStoredPhotons)
00115     {
00116             dist1 = np->m_pos[ p->m_plane ] - p->m_pos[ p->m_plane ];
00117             if ( dist1>0.0 )
00118             {
00119                 locatePhotons( np, 2*index+1 );
00120                 if ( dist1*dist1 < np->m_dist2[0] ) locatePhotons( np, 2*index );
00121             }
00122             else
00123             {
00124                 locatePhotons( np, 2*index );
00125                 if ( dist1*dist1 < np->m_dist2[0] ) locatePhotons( np, 2*index+1 );
00126             }
00127         }
00128 
00129         double dist2 = DistanceSquared(p->m_pos, np->m_pos);
00130         
00131         if ( dist2 < np->m_dist2[0] )
00132         {
00133             if ( np->m_found < np->m_max )
00134             {
00135                 np->m_found++;
00136                 np->m_dist2[np->m_found] = dist2;
00137                 np->m_index[np->m_found] = p;
00138             }
00139             else
00140             {
00141                 long unsigned j,parent;
00142             if ( np->m_gotHeap==0 )
00143             {
00144                     double dst2;
00145                     Photon* phot;
00146                     long unsigned halfFound = np->m_found>>1;
00147                     for ( long unsigned k = halfFound; k >= 1; k-- )
00148                     {
00149                         parent = k;
00150                         phot = np->m_index[k];
00151                         dst2 = np->m_dist2[k];
00152                         while ( parent <= halfFound )
00153                         {
00154                             j = parent + parent;
00155                             if ( j < np->m_found && np->m_dist2[j] < np->m_dist2[j+1] )
00156                             j++;
00157                             if ( dst2 >= np->m_dist2[j] ) break;
00158                             np->m_dist2[parent] = np->m_dist2[j];
00159                             np->m_index[parent] = np->m_index[j];
00160                             parent = j;
00161                         }
00162                         np->m_dist2[parent] = dst2;
00163                         np->m_index[parent] = phot;
00164                     }
00165                     np->m_gotHeap = 1;
00166                 }
00167         
00168                 // insert new photon into max heap
00169                 // delete largest element, insert new and reorder the heap
00170         
00171                 parent=1;
00172                 j = 2;
00173                 while ( j <= np->m_found )
00174                 {
00175                     if ( j < np->m_found && np->m_dist2[j] < np->m_dist2[j+1] )
00176                     j++;
00177                     if ( dist2 > np->m_dist2[j] ) break;
00178                     np->m_dist2[parent] = np->m_dist2[j];
00179                     np->m_index[parent] = np->m_index[j];
00180                     parent = j;
00181                     j += j;
00182                 }
00183                 np->m_index[parent] = p;
00184                 np->m_dist2[parent] = dist2;
00185                 np->m_dist2[0] = np->m_dist2[1];
00186             }
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 double PhotonMap::fluxAtPoint( const Point3D& point, int maxClosest ) const
00191 {
00192         NearestPhotons np;
00193         //np.m_index = new Photon[maxClosest][];
00194         np.m_dist2 = (double*)malloc( sizeof(double)*(maxClosest+1) );
00195         np.m_index = (Photon**)malloc( sizeof(Photon*)*(maxClosest+1) );
00196         np.m_max = maxClosest;
00197         np.m_pos = point;
00198         np.m_found = 0;
00199         np.m_gotHeap = 0;
00200         np.m_dist2[0] = 10;
00201         
00202         locatePhotons(&np, 1);
00203         Point3D furthest = np.m_index[np.m_found]->m_pos;
00204         double radius = Distance(point, furthest);
00205         free(np.m_dist2);
00206     free(np.m_index);
00207         return maxClosest / radius;
00208 }
00209 
00210 void PhotonMap :: store( Photon* photon )
00211 {
00212         if ( m_storedPhotons >= m_maxPhotons ) return;
00213         
00214         m_storedPhotons++;
00215         photon->m_id = m_storedPhotons;
00216         m_photons[m_storedPhotons] = photon;
00217         
00218         m_bbox = Union( m_bbox,photon->m_pos );
00219 }

00221 // balance creates a left balanced kd-tree from the flat photon array.
00222 // * This function should be called before the photon map is used for rendering.
00223 void PhotonMap::balance()
00224 {
00225     if ( m_storedPhotons > 1 )
00226         {
00227         // allocate two temporary arrays for the balancing procedure
00228                 Photon*** pa1 = new Photon**[m_maxPhotons+1];
00229                 Photon*** pa2 = new Photon**[m_maxPhotons+1];
00230         
00231                 long unsigned i;
00232                 for ( i = 0; i <= m_storedPhotons; i++ ) pa2[i] = &m_photons[i];
00233                 balanceSegment( pa1, pa2, 1, 1, m_storedPhotons );
00234                 
00235                 delete[] pa2;
00236         pa2 = 0;
00237         
00238             // reorganize balanced kd-tree (make a heap)
00239             long unsigned d;
00240             long unsigned j = 1;
00241             long unsigned foo = 1;
00242             Photon* foo_photon = m_photons[j];
00243             for ( i=1; i <= m_storedPhotons; i++ )
00244             {   
00245                     d = pa1[j]-m_photons;
00246                     pa1[j] = 0;
00247                                 
00248                     if ( d != foo ) m_photons[j] = m_photons[d];
00249                     else
00250                     {
00251                         m_photons[j] = foo_photon;
00252                         if ( i < m_storedPhotons )
00253                         {
00254                                         for ( ; foo<= m_storedPhotons; foo++ ) if ( pa1[foo] != 0 ) break;
00255                                         foo_photon = m_photons[foo];
00256                                 j = foo;
00257                         }
00258                         continue;
00259                     }
00260                     j = d;
00261             }
00262             delete[] pa1;
00263         pa1 = 0;
00264     }
00265         m_halfStoredPhotons = m_storedPhotons / 2 - 1;
00266 }
00267 
00268 #define swap(ph,a,b) { Photon** ph2=ph[a]; ph[a]=ph[b]; ph[b]=ph2; }
00269 
00270 // median_split splits the photon array into two separate
00271 // pieces around the median with all photons below the
00272 // the median in the lower half and all photons above
00273 // than the median in the upper half. The comparison
00274 // criteria is the axis (indicated by the axis parameter)
00275 // (inspired by routine in "Algorithms in C++" by Sedgewick)
00276 void PhotonMap::medianSplit( Photon*** p, const long unsigned start, const long unsigned end, 
00277                              const long unsigned median, const long unsigned axis )         
00278 {
00279 
00280         long unsigned left = start;
00281     long unsigned right = end;
00282 
00283     while ( right > left )
00284     {
00285         const double v = p[right][0]->m_pos[axis];
00286         long unsigned i = left-1;
00287         long unsigned j = right;
00288         for (;;)
00289         {
00290             while ( p[++i][0]->m_pos[axis]< v && i < right );
00291             while ( p[--j][0]->m_pos[axis] > v && j>left );
00292             if ( i >= j ) break;
00293             swap(p,i,j);
00294         }
00295         swap(p,i,right);
00296         if ( i >= median ) right=i-1;
00297         if ( i <= median ) left=i+1;
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 void PhotonMap::balanceSegment( Photon*** pbal, Photon*** porg, const long unsigned index, const long unsigned start, const long unsigned end )
00302 {
00303     long unsigned median=1;
00304         while ( ( 4*median ) <= ( end-start+1 ) ) median += median;
00305 
00306         if ( (3*median ) <= ( end-start+1 ) )
00307         {
00308             median += median;
00309                 median += start-1;
00310         }
00311         else median = end - median+1;
00312 
00313     //Find axis to split along
00314         long unsigned axis=2;
00315         if ( ( m_bbox.pMax[0] - m_bbox.pMin[0] ) > ( m_bbox.pMax[1] - m_bbox.pMin[1] ) &&
00316                  ( m_bbox.pMax[0] - m_bbox.pMin[0] ) > ( m_bbox.pMax[2]-m_bbox.pMin[2] ) ) axis = 0;
00317         else if ( ( m_bbox.pMax[1] - m_bbox.pMin[1] ) > ( m_bbox.pMax[2] - m_bbox.pMin[2] ) ) axis = 1;
00318 
00319         m_axis = axis;
00320         
00321     //Partition photon block around the median
00322         medianSplit( porg, start, end, median, axis );
00323         porg[ median ][0]->m_plane = axis;
00324         pbal[ index ] = porg[ median ];
00325 
00326     //Recursively balance the left and right block
00327     if ( median > start )
00328     {
00329         //Balance left segment
00330         if ( start < median-1 )
00331         {
00332             const double tmp = m_bbox.pMax[axis];
00333             m_bbox.pMax[axis] = pbal[index][0]->m_pos[axis];
00334             balanceSegment( pbal, porg, 2*index, start, median-1 );
00335             m_bbox.pMax[axis] = tmp;
00336         }
00337         else pbal[ 2*index ] = porg[start];
00338     }
00339         
00340         if ( median < end )
00341         {
00342         //Balance right segment
00343         if ( median+1 < end )
00344         {
00345             const double tmp = m_bbox.pMin[axis];     
00346                 m_bbox.pMin[axis] = pbal[index][0]->m_pos[axis];
00347                 balanceSegment( pbal, porg, 2*index+1, median+1, end );
00348                 m_bbox.pMin[axis] = tmp;
00349         } 
00350         else pbal[ 2*index+1 ] = porg[end];
00351     }
00352 }
00353 
00354 Photon* PhotonMap::GetPhoton( int index ) const
00355 {
00356         Trace trace( "PhotonMap::GetPhoton", false );
00357         return m_photons[index]; 
00358 }
